entries.title: US tracking large Chinese spy balloon flying across the country, officials say
entries.description: A massive spy balloon from China has been surveilling the United States, a senior U.S. official said on Thursday

entries.title: US to gain access to more bases in the Philippines with eye on China
entries.description: The U.S. military will gain access to more bases in the Philippines under new deal prompted by concerns about China's ambitions in the Pacific.

entries.title: Newly obtained 911 calls reveal chaos and heartbreak during Monterey Park massacre
entries.description: Newly obtained 911 calls and radio traffic reveal the chaos as the Monterey Park, California, mass shooting unfolded.

entries.title: Crowds decry gender-affirming treatment ban in West Virginia
entries.description: Crowds pleaded with lawmakers at the West Virginia Capitol on Thursday to show as much compassion for saving the lives of transgender children as they showed for unborn fetuses when they voted to ban abortion

entries.title: 1 dead, officer wounded in shooting at Memphis library
entries.description: Authorities say a shooting at a Tennessee library has left one person dead and a police officer critically wounded

entries.title: Feds seized records, phone of former Michigan House leader
entries.description: A former leader of the Michigan state House had his phone seized as part of a federal investigation that included grand jury subpoenas, search warrants and bank records

entries.title: How the George Floyd policing bill would reform law enforcement
entries.description: The funeral for Tyre Nichols was filled with tributes for the 29-year-old who died after a violent encounter with police, and a call to action for reform.

entries.title: Woman steals Maltipoo puppy, attacks owner in violent assault caught on camera
entries.description: A woman was seen stealing a Maltipoo puppy and attacking the dog's owner in a violent assault caught on camera in broad daylight.

entries.title: US releases Guantanamo prisoner once tortured at CIA sites
entries.description: A onetime al-Qaida courier has been released after serving more than 16 years at the Guantanamo Bay detention center and enduring torture at clandestine overseas CIA sites

entries.title: Principal was not informed 6-year-old had a gun before shooting, lawyer says
entries.description: Former Richneck Elementary School Principal Briana Foster Newton claims she was not warned that the 6-year-old student had a gun at school the day of the shooting.

entries.title: WATCH:  Woman caught on camera stealing puppy, attacking owner
entries.description: The attack was captured by a surveillance camera in Bell Gardens, California.

entries.title: Assault rifles, ammunition seized from Hollywood high-rise
entries.description: Los Angeles police have arrested a man who reportedly made violent threats, and investigators seized a cache of guns and ammunition in his Hollywood high-rise apartment

entries.title: UK to probe whether 1998 Omagh bomb could have been stopped
entries.description: The U.K. government says it will hold a public inquiry into whether the deadliest bombing in Northern Ireland’s decades of violence could have been prevented

entries.title: Authorities: Man shot after reporting self as trespasser
entries.description: Authorities say a man who might have been experiencing a mental health crisis has been shot and injured by Texas deputies after apparently calling 911 and describing himself as a trespasser outside his home

entries.title: House Republicans vote to kick Rep. Ilhan Omar off Foreign Affairs Committee
entries.description: House Republicans on Thursday voted to kick Democratic Rep. Ilhan Omar off the House Foreign Affairs Committee.

entries.title: 'Squid Game' star goes on trial for sexual misconduct
entries.description: Actor Oh Yeong-soo, who rose to global recognition after appearing in the Netflix hit "Squid game," goes on trial for sexual misconduct on Friday.

entries.title: FBI scheduling search of former Vice President Pence's home for classified docs
entries.description: The Department of Justice is in contact with former Vice President Mike Pence's lawyers about scheduling a potential search of his home in Indiana.

entries.title: WATCH:  Watch this little girl nail all the steps in this workout routine
entries.description: We wish we were as coordinated!

entries.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court candidate focuses on parade crash
entries.description: A conservative candidate in a pivotal race for Wisconsin Supreme Court is using video images of an SUV that drove through a Christmas parade in suburban Milwaukee, killing six people, in her first television ad of the race

entries.title: Discrepancy between police accounts, evidence in Tyre Nichols case revealed
entries.description: In the Tyre Nichols case, as well as several others, incident reports do not match up with body camera footage. Law enforcement officials explain why.

entries.title: Eye drops linked to US drug-resistant bacteria outbreak
entries.description: U.S. health officials are advising people to stop using over-the-counter eye drops that have been linked to an outbreak of drug-resistant infections

entries.title: 26-year-old arrested for allegedly throwing Molotov cocktail at synagogue
entries.description: Federal prosecutors have charged a 26-year-old man suspected of throwing a Molotov cocktail at a New Jersey synagogue.

entries.title: US filings for jobless aid lowest since April
entries.description: Applications for jobless aid in the U.S. fell by 3,000 last week to 183,000.

entries.title: WATCH:  Twitter institutes new appeals process for suspended accounts
entries.description: Users can access an online form to request their account be reinstated.

entries.title: 2 South Carolina men charged following 2019 murder of transgender woman
entries.description: Over three years after the Pebbles LaDime “Dime” Dow was found dead, the Department of Justice unsealed charges against two men involved in her murder.

entries.title: Punxsutawney Phil sees his shadow, predicts 6 more weeks of winter
entries.description: Punxsutawney Phil awoke this morning to see his shadow which means that -- according to legend -- there will be six more weeks of winter.

entries.title: New Jersey councilwoman shot and killed in possible targeted attack outside her home
entries.description: A 30-year-old woman found fatally shot in her Sayreville townhouse complex has been identified by local officials as Councilwoman Eunice Dwumfour.

entries.title: WATCH:  Bus drives through shoulder-high floodwaters in New Zealand
entries.description: The driver of a bus in Auckland, New Zealand, decided to forgo a detour and drive straight through deep floodwaters.

entries.title: Shell profit doubles to record as war drives up energy costs
entries.description: Global energy giant Shell says annual profits doubled to a record high last year as oil and gas prices soared after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine

entries.title: Punxsutawney Phil prepares to make Groundhog Day prediction
entries.description: It’s Groundhog Day and people are waiting to learn whether a furry critter in a western Pennsylvania town will predict an early spring or six more weeks of winter

entries.title: Attorneys for 'Rust' armorer say she was pressured to work in unsafe environment
entries.description: Attorneys for the "Rust" film armorer charged with involuntary manslaughter Tuesday said she felt "extreme pressure" to work within an irresponsible culture.

entries.title: WATCH:  Bulldog loses footing on icy sidewalk
entries.description: Walking on ice isn't just a challenge for humans. Sometimes, it's tough for dogs, too.

entries.title: Vet who claimed Santos stole money for his dying dog says FBI has reached out to him
entries.description: The FBI has contacted a Navy veteran, Richard Osthoff, as part of an investigation into George Santos and a GoFundMe campaign to raise money for Osthoff's sick dog.

entries.title: Dallas Zoo offering $25,000 reward for information about animal habitat tampering
entries.description: A day after two missing monkeys from the Dallas Zoo were found, the zoo is upping its reward for information on who may have been tampering with its animal exhibits.

entries.title: Canadian province decriminalizes drugs to fight overdose deaths
entries.description: The Canadian province of British Columbia said it's decriminalizing small amounts of some drugs to help combat the number of drug overdose deaths.

entries.title: Man dies after brawl breaks out at middle school basketball game: Police
entries.description: A 60-year-old man died after a fight broke out between spectators at a middle school basketball game in Alburgh, Vermont, on Tuesday, according to state police.
